description.en:
Collection of short stories

1. Egg Shell
2. Passionate Electric Waves - Chapter 1
3. Passionate Electric Waves - Chapter 2
4. Kiss Kiss
5. Koi no Dracula (Dracula in Love) - Chapter 1
6. Koi no Dracula (Dracula in Love) - Chapter 2
7. Koi no Dracula (Dracula in Love) - Chapter 3
8. Koi no Dracula (Dracula in Love) - Chapter 4
9. Love Clone
10. Night in the Ancient Ruins

Descriptions:

[*] Egg Shell - Not yet translated
[*] Passionate Electric Waves - Ema and Aya are two girls with a very intimate relationship. Stuck somewhere between friends and lovers, their feelings will soon begin to change and grow after an encounter with a most unusual visitor.
[*] Kiss Kiss - Not yet translated
[*] Koi no Dracula (Dracula in Love) - Not yet translated
[*] Love Clone - Not yet translated
[*] Night in the Ancient Ruins - Not yet translated
